trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Norton Shores
There were no other sightings in Norton Shores on or around September 27th 2010
Summary: wife seen starlike object in eastern sky seen it disappear and reappear then disappear again
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife reported this incident to me last night its pretty much the way she discribed it to me as in the short discription as above she was going to work at approx. 7:45 am looked in sky seen object looked away looked up it was gone looked again seen object again looked away because she driving looked again it was gone she would not have told me about if she didn't think it was unusual.she works till 5;00 pm if you would like her first hand account. if you have info satilite,baloon,etc. contact my email.
